> Mordekaiser isn't any less useless then most mages

Except in 95% of all situations, he is. He can't siege without putting himself at risk. He can't burst unless the target is already low. And because he's melee, he has to always be in the middle of things. So either he builds full glass cannon and hopes to kill something before he dies, or he builds bruiser and trades damage for survivability.
